line.annotation: create_ing(ing33, "1 (750 milliliter) bottle 190 proof grain alcohol")

line.originaltext: In a large pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, sugar and cinnamon sticks.
In a large pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, sugar and cinnamon sticks.
line.annotation: combine({ing29, ing30, ing31, ing32}, ing34, "apple juice mix", "")

line.originaltext: In a large pot, combine apple juice, apple cider, sugar and cinnamon sticks.
Bring to a boil, then remove from heat and let cool completely.
Bring to a boil, then remove from heat and let cool completely.
line.annotation: cook(ing34, t6, ing35, "hot apple juice mix", "bring to boil, then remove from heat")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil, then remove from heat and let cool completely.
When juice mixture is cool, Stir in the grain alcohol.
line.annotation: combine({ing33, ing35}, ing36, "alcoholic apple juice mix", "stir")
